calculateQuorumAddress(address[],uint256.details: Beware that only the `newQuorum` function with the `salt` parameter      is able to deterministically deploy a quorum.

params.salt: The salt used to deterministically generate the quorum address

newQuorum(address[],uint256).details: On success, MUST emit a `QuorumCreated` event.Duplicates in the `validators` array are ignored.Reverts if the epoch length is zero.

newQuorum(address[],uint256,bytes32).details: On success, MUST emit a `QuorumCreated` event.Duplicates in the `validators` array are ignored.Reverts if the epoch length is zero.

params.salt: The salt used to deterministically generate the quorum address

calculateQuorumAddress(address[],uint256.notice: Calculate the address of a quorum to be deployed deterministically.
